title: Mobile Science Inquiry Learning Module on Absorption Topics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and the ability to observe everyday phenomena
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based self-directed learning environment with access to simple experimental tools during project implementation

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of absorption phenomena using structured inquiry strategies.
Learners can compare material properties that determine water absorption capacity through mobile module content.
Learners can complete a project analyzing everyday absorption cases and representing them with mathematical data.

resources: Simple Experiment Kit (Cotton Swabs, Sponges, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
